name: Ruins of Macedonia
description:
This is a game I made for the CCC Game jam. 

It isn't the best game I've ever seen, however I have fun when playing it so I consider that to be a win.

EDIT: Some people have told me this is very hard. It is apparently a rage game, though this wasn't my intention. I may fix this if I update this in the future.

ONE THINGS TO NOTE:

To exit the game, press ESCAPE when you are not on the title screen. If you are on the title screen, it won't work.
